Unwarranted, concentrated economic power in the hands of a few is dangerous to democracy – especially when digital platforms control content. The era of self-regulation is over.

How costs have risen in the last decade alone:

Education: 📈+65%
Food: 📈+26%
Health care: 📈+21%
Housing: 📈+16%
Transportation: 📈+11%

We need college for all, Medicare for all and jobs for all if millennials are going to have a fair shot at a decent standard of living.

The teacher strikes in West Virginia and many more states in the last few years have transformed our country. Educators have a right to demand a better life and more investment in education.

Far too many LGBTQ+ individuals continue to face discrimination in America. This #PrideMonth, we should pass the Equality Act in the Senate to ensure sexual orientation and gender identity are explicitly protected under the Civil Rights Act. It's just the right thing to do.

These past few years have been some of the deadliest for the transgender community, especially trans women of color. Anti-transgender violence and bigotry have no place in our nation. This pride month, and every month, we will fight for your safety and security. https://twitter.com/NBCOUT/status/1131590831977185282 QT @NBCOUT Police in Dallas said they are investigating whether the shooting deaths of two transgender women and the stabbing of a third are connected. https://www.nbcnews.com/feature/nbc-out/two-transgender-women-color-killed-one-weekend-one-arrest-made-n1008386
